text: Va [ej pajomʙar] agar rujgardonii onon [az Qur'on] ʙar tu noguvor [va dusvor] ast, agar metavoni naqʙe (tunel) dar zamin jo nardʙone dar osmon ʙicui, to mu'ciza [digar] ʙarojason ʙijovari [pas, cunon kun, vale sude nadorad].Va agar Alloh taolo mexost, hatman, ononro ʙar [masiri] hidojat cam' mekard, pas, hargiz az nodonon maʙos
